title: lab_market_trends

title: evaluation_job_program
description: I was hired as a remote research assistant to assess the effectiveness of a job intermediation program administered by a job agency located in Bogot√°, using program evaluation techniques. We used propensity score matching to account for selection bias due to the job agency's targeting policies.
